definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (Ar. h.ad.oramawt, Sab. [[חחַרמות]], [[חחַרמת]], Os:ZMG 1865, 289 ff. DHM:ZMG 1883, 18. 412)—a ‘ son ’ of [[יׇקְטָן]], 5th in order from Shem ([[שֵׁם]], 1. [[אַרְפַּכְשַׁד]]; 2. [[שֶׁלַת]]; 3. [[עֵבֶר]]; 4. [[יׇקְטָן]]; 5. ´[[ח]] Ge 10:26 = 1Ch 1:20, LXX Asar(a)mwq; =

definitions.title: n.pr.terr.
definitions.body: a district in southern Arabia, where dwelt the Catramwti=tai (Strabo:xvi. 4. 2); mod. Ḥaḍramaut (or Ḥaḍramût, see Maltzan:ZMG 1871, 498 Mordt:ZMG 1876, 323, van d. Berg:p. 9, v. infr.) is same land, but not quite co-extensive; v. Di Ge 10:26, Ritter:Erdkunde xii (Arabien i) 609 ff., de Goeje:Ḥadhr. 1886, van den Berg:Ḥadhramout, 1886, Glaser:Skizze ii. 20, 428 ff. etc.; on its precise limits see esp. Ritter:611 ff, de Goeje:l. c. van d. Berg:ch. i.
